means: （供一人或两人乘坐的）轻便马车

sentence.Network_en: She proceeded to recline on a chaise longue.
sentence.Network_cn: 她接着躺在了一个躺椅上。

sentence.Network_en: Magna was lying on a chaise longue.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格娜躺在一把躺椅上.

sentence.Network_en: Oh! but the gentlemen will have Mr. Bingley's chaise to go to Meryton; and the Hursts have no horses to theirs.
sentence.Network_cn: 噢, 彬格莱先生的马车要送他的朋友到麦里屯去, 赫斯脱夫妇又是有车无马.
